name: Tinicum Capital Partners II
overview: Tinicum Capital Partners, L.P. was formed in December 1998 with committed capital of $272 million and is fully invested. Tinicum Capital Partners II, L.P. was formed in May 2004 and has committed capital of $1.325 billion. Tinicumâ€™s investors are all individuals and families (no institutional investors).
